title: Red Raven
sinopse:
When the Raven starts to sing, people die...

An unstable world, a weak government... and Mafia's escaping from their sins...

In order to reduce unpunished crimes committed by the Mafia...

A strength was born...

Its agents are merciless and they kill without hesitation.

The Last Enforcement Organization known as Red Raven.

(Source: Easy Going Scans)
